<JD_START>
Job Title: Director of Portfolio Analytics (Full Stack Development)

Location: New York, NY

Employment Type: full-time

Listed Skills: Information Technology, Management

Description:
Source One is a staffing services company and we’re currently looking for the following individual to work as an employee of our direct client, a major insurance firm.
Title: Director of Portfolio Analytics (Full Stack, developing platform and tools) - PermanentLocation: New York, NY (hybrid role - 3 days on-site / 2 days remote)Base Salary: $235,000
Responsibilities:• Lead in building portfolio management platforms to allow strategy creation, facilitate internal communication, track strategy execution, and create senior management reporting.• Support ad-hoc requests by collecting additional data, researching vendors, proposing data analytics methods/insights.• Lead or co-lead development of senior management reporting to help drive business actions. It will include collaboration with data and analytics colleagues, prototyping actionable exhibits, and socializing to get business unit buy-in.• Work closely with the business unit leads to track progress of renewal, and to facilitate successful execution of underwriting strategy.• Analyze global reinsurance portfolio, synthesize findings, and provide actionable insight into business metrics, issues, and other opportunities.• Automate reporting and analyzing of the portfolio.
Qualifications, Education & Experience:• Bachelor’s degree in a quantitative field required• 5-10 years of experience with full stack development, across back-end such as Java, Python, SQL, GO, and/or C++ codebases, and front-end experience including JavaScript and/or TypeScript, HTML, CSS, API, Json, or equivalent• Experience in insurance/reinsurance is preferred and is willing to learn new insurance/reinsurance concepts; need to be adaptive to changes quickly and work efficiently• Advanced PC skills• Proficient in Excel and PowerPoint are required• Power BI is preferred• Possess excellent analytical and presentation skills with an ability to quickly analyze and interpret data• Must be a self-starter and independent thinker with strong attention to details; you will be working in a fast-paced environment with requirement to turnaround projects fast• Communicate clearly and effectively in all mediums, and operate effectively in a culture that promotes collaboration, execution, humility, thoughtfulness, and leadership

Experience Level (if available): Director
<JD_END>
